event.$description: Short name for the physical event this message was for, usually the same as the donation tracker.

logo.$description: Name/URL of the logo file that is now being shown; will not be defined if nothing is shown on stream.

length.$description: Length of time in seconds that the sponsor logo is set to show for; will not be defined if nothing is shown on stream.

unix.$description: Time scene was changed in seconds since UNIX Epoch.

iso.$description: Time scene was changed in ISO 8601 format.
